content:
Granito
Granito (Granite) is a city  in the state of Pernambuco, Brazil. The population in 2009, according with IBGE was 7,251  inhabitants and the total area is 522 square kilometres (202 sq mi).{"citetype": "web", "url ": "http://cod.ibge.gov.br/3O9I", "title ": "Granito", "year ": "2015", "publisher ": "Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatstica", "location ": "Bras\u00edlia, Brazil", "accessdate ": "2015-08-24", "language ": "Portuguese"}

Economy
The main economic activities in Granito are based in agribusiness, especially creation of cattle, sheep,  goats, donkeys, chickens;  and plantations of corn.
